name: part_006
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Tokoyami Towa 2nd Live ＂SHINier＂【有明アリーナ】 [ZjuDUe4jnqE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Opening of the concert with audience shots and intro visuals for the song.
Performance of the song 'ERROR' by Tokoyami Towa.

subtitles.original: ERROR
subtitles.english: ERROR

subtitles.original: 鈍色の目の 涙命の色に滲んでいる
subtitles.english: Dark grey eyes' tears are bleeding into the color of life

subtitles.original: 何を残して与えた 問いかけて潰れて
subtitles.english: What did I leave behind and give? I ask and crumble.

subtitles.original: 青と赤と白を混ぜるこの世の真ん中で叫んでいる
subtitles.english: Mixing blue, red, and white, I'm screaming in the middle of this world

subtitles.original: 何を求めて歩いた 追いかけて疲れて
subtitles.english: What was I looking for as I walked? I chased and grew tired.

subtitles.original: どのくらい以上 壊れているの?
subtitles.english: How much more than this am I broken?

subtitles.original: 壊れているよ
subtitles.english: I am broken

subtitles.original: それでも息をしたい したい
subtitles.english: Even so, I want to breathe, I want to.

subtitles.original: 君に見えてるの
subtitles.english: Is it visible to you?

subtitles.original: 夢のように最後の言葉も詰まるよ
subtitles.english: Like a dream, even my last words get stuck.

subtitles.original: ERROR
subtitles.english: ERROR

subtitles.original: 遠い日の言葉 淡い光が空に溢れている
subtitles.english: Words from a distant day, a faint light is overflowing in the sky

subtitles.original: 何を選んで並べた 涙色重ねて
subtitles.english: What did I choose and line up? Overlapping the colors of tears.

subtitles.original: 浮かぶその体 意識の中 溶けて滲んでしまう
subtitles.english: That floating body dissolves and bleeds into my consciousness

subtitles.original: 何を見てきて比べた 悲しくて忘れて
subtitles.english: What have I seen and compared? Being sad and forgetting.

subtitles.original: どのくらい以上 歪んでいるの?
subtitles.english: How much more than this am I distorted?

subtitles.original: 歪んでいるよ
subtitles.english: I am distorted

subtitles.original: それでも息をしたい したい
subtitles.english: Even so, I want to breathe, I want to.

subtitles.original: 夢を見ているの
subtitles.english: I am dreaming

subtitles.original: 想う君に最後の言葉も詰まるよ
subtitles.english: Thinking of you, even my last words get stuck.

subtitles.original: ERROR
subtitles.english: ERROR
